price: 6. Hadduu qof ka mid ahi mushrikiinta idin weydiisto magan galyo magan geliya si uu u maqlo hadalka Alle (Qur’aanka), kaddibna gaarsiiya halkuu ku nabad helayo, sidani waxaa ku wacan waa qolo aan garasho lahayn.
arabic: وَإِنۡ أَحَدٞ مِّنَ ٱلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ ٱسۡتَجَارَكَ فَأَجِرۡهُ حَتَّىٰ يَسۡمَعَ كَلَٰمَ ٱللَّهِ ثُمَّ أَبۡلِغۡهُ مَأۡمَنَهُۥۚ ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمۡ قَوۡمٞ لَّا يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-in aḥadun mina al-mush'rikīna is'tajāraka fa-ajir'hu ḥattā yasmaʿa kalāma al-lahi thumma abligh'hu mamanahu dhālika bi-annahum qawmun lā yaʿlamūna
